definitions.definition: Someone who is on holiday
definitions.example: The beaches were crowded with holidaymakers.

definitions.definition: Any grass of the genus Bromus.
Bromine
Very strong; possessing might.
definitions.example: He's a mighty wrestler, but you are faster than him.

definitions.definition: Very heavy and powerful.
definitions.example: He gave the ball a mighty hit.

definitions.definition: Very large; hefty.
Accomplished by might; hence, extraordinary; wonderful.
Excellent, extremely good.
To put on the throne in a formal installation ceremony called enthronement, equivalent to (and often combined with) coronation and/or other ceremonies of investiture
To help a candidate to the succession of a monarchy (as a kingmaker does), or by extension in any other major organisation.
Placed upon a throne.
Formally inaugurated.
To overload or overtax
Excessively burdened
To denounce as harmful.
To blame for ills.
To cream; mantle; foam; froth.
To enlarge a hole, especially using a reamer; to bore a hole wider.
To shape or form, especially using a reamer.
To remove (material) by reaming.
To remove burrs and debris from a freshly bored hole.
To yell at or berate.
(by extension from sense of enlarging a hole) To sexually penetrate in a rough and painful way.
To decrease, shrink, diminish, reduce in size or intensity.
To fall away in quality; degenerate, sink.
To lessen; to bring low.
To break up or disperse.
A building or a place where several activities occur in multiple units concurrently or different times.
(by extension) A large cinema complex comprising many (typically more than five, and often over ten) movie theatres or houses.
Throwing motion where more than one ball is thrown with one hand at the same time.
To interleave several activities.
To combine several signals into one.
To convert (a cinema business) into a large complex, or multiplex.
(juggling) To make a multiplex throw.
The sale of products, often in large quantities, to retailers or other merchants.
To sell at wholesale.
Any of several evergreen shrubs, of the genus Vinca, including the periwinkle

(with in (or sometimes with, to)) To rest satisfied, or apparently satisfied, or to rest without opposition and discontent (usually implying previous opposition or discontent); to accept or consent by silence or by omitting to object.
To concur upon conviction; as, to acquiesce in an opinion; to assent to; usually, to concur, not heartily but so far as to forbear opposition.
Eagerness; liveliness; enthusiasm.
Promptness; speed.
The state of being interconnected.
According to some worldviews, a oneness in all things, with no true separation deeper than appearances.
A person who feels compelled to work excessively.
definitions.example: All workaholics should move to Hong Kong, where working hours average over 50 per week.

definitions.definition: In the nature or manner of a workaholic.
A hinged bridge which can be raised (to prevent its being crossed, as across a moat, or to allow watercraft to travel beneath it).
To modernize, repair, renovate, or revise completely.
To pass, overtake, or travel past.
To keep (running rigging) clear, and see that no hitch occurs.
To search (a ship) for contraband goods.
The act by which something is overhauled.
To hoax; to chaff or mock with pretended seriousness of discourse; to make sport of, as by obscure questions.
To peer at; to eye suspiciously or mockingly.
To question closely, to interrogate.
To instruct by means of a quiz.
To play with a quiz.
(grammar) The locative case.
(grammar) Indicating place, or the place where, or wherein.
A condition in which a tissue or environment is severely or totally deprived of oxygen, severe hypoxia.
To render into dust or powder.
To completely destroy, especially by crushing to fragments or a powder.
To defeat soundly, thrash.
To become reduced to powder; to fall to dust.
A piece of land projecting into water from a larger land mass.
A chemical substance derived from a biological source
The point at which something terminates or to which it is limited.
A road, path or channel that provides a shorter or quicker path; a shortcut.
A device that stops the flow of a current.
A device for saving steam by regulating its admission to the cylinder (see quotation at cut-off).
A cessation in a flow or activity.
The player who acts directly before the player on the button pre-flop.
(chiefly in the plural) shorts made by cutting off the legs from trousers
A horizontal line separating sections of the page.
Having, or being full of, holes
Dedicated to a religious purpose or a god.
definitions.example: I'm planning to visit the holy city of Jerusalem this Christmas.

definitions.definition: Revered in a religion.
Morally perfect or flawless, or nearly so.
definitions.example: My grandmother is a very holy woman.

definitions.definition: Separated or set apart from (something unto something or someone else).
Set apart or dedicated for a specific purpose, or for use by a single entity or person.
Used as an intensifier in various interjections.
definitions.example: Holy cow, I can’t believe he actually lost the race!

definitions.definition: To stock to an excessive degree.
A hypodermic syringe, needle or injection
Of, or relating to the hypodermis, the layer beneath the dermis
To divide into segments or sections.
To ejaculate; to eject semen.
To ejaculate on, over, or into; to cover in semen.
An evergreen plant, Calluna vulgaris, with spiky leaves and small purple, pink, or white flowers.
The Ericaceae family.
Various species of the genus Erica.
Various species of the genus Cassiope.
A purple colour with a tint of pink and blue.
The use of interwoven yarns of mixed colours to produce flecks.
(fantasy literature, fairy tales) A playful sprite or elflike or fairy-like creature.
A cute, petite woman with short hair.
An upper-atmospheric optical phenomenon associated with thunderstorms, a short-lasting pinpoint of light on the surface of convective domes that produces a gnome.
The point on the land or water surface directly above the focus, or hypocentre, of an earthquake.
The point on the surface of the earth directly above an underground explosion.
The focal point of any activity, especially if dangerous or destructive.
The geographical area in which an ongoing disaster, illness, crisis, or other destructive event is currently most severe.
Of an earthquake: to have its epicentre (at a specified location).
To strike in the face.
To assault for the purpose of robbery.
To exaggerate a facial expression for communicative emphasis; to make a face, to pose, as for photographs or in a performance, in an exaggerated or affected manner.
definitions.example: The children weren't interested in sitting still for a serious photo; they mugged for the camera.

definitions.definition: To photograph for identification; to take a mug shot.
To learn or review a subject as much as possible in a short time; cram.
A quick violent robbery of a person, usually in a public place.
definitions.example: There have been three muggings in this street in the past week.
